IN VIEW OF THE ABOVE, THE CREDIT CARD FACILITY HAS BEEN                                                                             
TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED AND YOU ARE ADVISED TO REFRAIN FURTHER                                                                        
USAGE OF THE CARD UNTIL FULL MINIMUM PAYMENT IS RECEIVED.                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
IN ORDER TO AVOID FURTHER INCONVENIENCE OR ADVERSE PAYMENT                                                                          
RECORD, WE WOULD APPRECIATE IF YOU COULD SETTLE THE FULL MINIMUM                                                                    
PAYMENT WITHIN 7 DAYS FROM THE DATE HEREOF.                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
SHOULD WE FAIL TO RECEIVE THE REQUIRED PAYMENT WITHIN THE NEXT 7                                                                    
DAYS, WE WILL BE COMPELLED TO REVIEW THE CREDIT CARD FACILITY FOR                                                                   
CANCELLATION AND WE WILL HAVE TO TAKE THE APPROPRIATE RECOVERY                                                                      
ACTION FOR THE WHOLE OUTSTANDING BALANCE INCLUDING SETTING OFF                                                                      
FROM YOUR BANKING ACCOUNT (S), APPOINTING DEBT COLLECTION AGENCY                                                                    
AND OR PROCEEDING WITH FURTHER LEGAL ACTION WHERE NECESSARY.                                                                        
                                                                                                                                    
PLEASE NOTE THAT FOR ACCOUNTS CANCELLED, REQUESTS FOR                                                                               
REINSTATEMENT WILL BE SUBJECTED TO THE NEW BANK NEGARA MALAYSIA                                                                     
RULING ON INCOME REQUIREMENTS.                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                    
THANK YOU

PADANG TEMU                                                                                                                         
75050 MELAKA                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                    
Dear Sir/Madam,                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 4506180030600580                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.

RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 4966230235846596                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.

97008 BINTULU                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
Dear Sir/Madam,                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 5421240039616968                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.

replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions

The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY

advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

Our Ref  : CCC/RMS/451/1/Q20/5239450335907126                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
Date     : 01/11/22                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                    
YUGASARAVANAN                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
NO 203 TAMAN BAN AIK                                                                                                                
71800 NILAI                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
Dear Sir/Madam,                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 5239450335907126                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.

ANG CHAI LIN                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                    
NO 4287 TMN DESA PERMAI                                                                                                             
KAMPUNG PAYA                                                                                                                        
71000 PORT DICKSON                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                    
Dear Sir/Madam,                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
RE        : Cancellation Of Card : 4842810730971195                                                                                 
-----------------------------------------------------------------                                                                   
The recent teleconversation on the above matter refers. We are to                                                                   
advise that your credit card bearing the above card number has                                                                      
been cancelled on 01/11/22 due to suspected fraud and a                                                                             
replacement card will be issued.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
In view thereof, we are to advise you of the followings:-                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
1. Refrain  from  further  usage  of the above credit card as the                                                                   
   card  ( inclusive  of  supplementary,  if  any ), is  to  be                                                                     
   surrendered  to  the  nearest  Maybank  branch  duly  cut into                                                                   
   halves.                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
2. In  case of any dispute, please  complete and return to us the                                                                   
   enclosed  declaration  form  duly  signed. The  form  must  be                                                                   
   returned  to  us  at  the  address  printed  below  or  fax to                                                                   
   03-20709081, within 14  days  from  date  of  this  letter  to                                                                   
   facilitate our investigation.                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
Meanwhile, we will be transferring the outstanding balance in the                                                                   
above card to your new replacement card's account. This transfer                                                                    
of balance will be reflected in your next statement of account.                                                                     
                                                                                                                                    
Please effect payment on your genuine charges into your new                                                                         
replacement card's account in order to avoid accumulation of                                                                        
finance charges which is to be borne by cardholder(s). ONLY                                                                         
finance and late charges imposed on the unauthorised transactions                                                                   
will be reversed out by us.                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
We regret for any inconvenience caused. Should you need any                                                                         
further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our                                                                           
Customer Service Representatives at 03-20787878 or fax to                                                                           
03-20709081 or e-mail to mbbcardservices@MAYbank.com.my.
